name: Fortus
aura: Increase Ally C. RATE in Arena battles by 25

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 35% chance of placing a [Fear] debuff for 1 turn. 

This attack will always be critical if the target is under a [Fear] or [True Fear] debuff.
skills.name: Taste of Oblivion

Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has an 80% chance of placing a [True Fear] debuff for 1 turn. This debuff cannot be resisted by targets under [Fear] debuffs.
skills.name: Horrors Beyond
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Will ignore 30% of each target’s DEF against targets under [Fear] or [True Fear] debuffs. This attack is always critical against targets under [Fear] or [True Fear] debuffs. 

The damage of this skill increases by 10% every time a [Fear] or [True Fear] debuff is placed on an enemy.

[This skill has a 40% chance to be unlocked for 1 turn whenever a [Fear] or [True Fear] debuff is placed on an enemy.]
skills.name: Astral Terrors
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.desc:
[Passive Effect]

Increases the chance of enemy skills failing by 15% when those enemies are under [Fear] or [True Fear] debuffs. 

[Active Effect]

Prevents this Champion's death and keeps them alive on 1 HP when hit by a fatal hit, then removes all buffs and debuffs from this Champion. After preventing this Champion’s death, fully heals them and fully depletes their Turn Meter. 

Then, has an 80% chance of placing a [Fear] debuff on all enemies for 1 turn. 

Finally, places a [Sleep] debuff on this Champion for 1 turn. This debuff cannot be resisted or blocked.
skills.name: Stars Align [P]
